    • checkProduction

      public boolean checkProduction​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resourceStatus) throws InvalidActionException
      This method checks if there are enough resources (in the Map passed as parameter) to activate the production. If the resources in the Map are enough it modifies the Map and subtract those resources, otherwise it throws an InvalidActionException
      Parameters:
      resourceStatus -
      Returns:
      true if there are enough resources in the map
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if there aren't enough resources in the map

    • addProducts

      public void addProducts​(Board board)
      This method adds to the resources of the player all the resources contained in the products.
      Parameters:
      board - the board of the player
